x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
A portal for schools and students to exchange or donate textbooks and educational devices.

Impacts

  • Save costs for thousands of low-income students.
  • Encourage sustainable education resource reuse.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Many Nigerian and Urban schools lack digital and learning resources, while others have underused equipment.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: EduCycle – Digital Textbook and Device Sharing Marketplace
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

This solution will use the products listed and not limited to the following;

  • Service Portal for listing/donating books and devices.
  • Flow Designer automates matching and logistics.
  • Performance Analytics tracks redistribution impact.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

It's optional but we can add logistics integration (courier APIs).

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Verifying item condition and delivery logistics.
